, and several other state capitals, it was built out of nowhere (in 1990) to house the government of its new-born state.
This is pretty much the middle of nowhere. Both bus and plane connect better southwards, via
The city is interesting as a study of urbanism. It was dimensioned for several times its current population.

value: content=This plaza contains the Carlos Presetes Memorial, designed by Oscar Niemeyer, a marker which represents the geodesic center of Brazil, and an array of panels representing the indigenous peoples of Apinajé, Khahô, Xerente, Karajá, Javaé and Xambioá.

There is a fresh water beach a couple of km from the center. Take any bus that goes to the university.

value: directions=just off main square, next to Unibanco
price=Single, shared bath R$ 18, with bath R$ 35.
